title: The Director's Journey
description: A five-part documentary series offering an intimate look at the life and career of legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese, featuring interviews with his closest collaborators.

title: The Man Behind the Laughs
description: A heartfelt documentary about comedian Paul Reubens, exploring his life and the creation of his iconic character, Pee-wee Herman.

title: Hearts in Harmony
description: An Emmy-winning reality series following individuals on the autism spectrum as they navigate the complexities of dating and relationships.

title: Riding the Giants
description: A thrilling documentary series chronicling the pursuit of the world's largest waves, capturing the courage and challenges faced by elite surfers.

title: Influencer Diaries
description: An intimate six-part series offering a glimpse into the life of influencer and entrepreneur Molly-Mae Hague, showcasing her personal and professional journey.

title: Stardom
description: A comprehensive documentary tracing Taylor Swift's rise from a Nashville teenager to a global music icon, featuring insights from journalists and fans.

title: Mind Divide
description: A psychological drama exploring the consequences of work-life balance through a radical corporate experiment. The second season earned 27 Emmy nominations in 2025.

title: Resort Secrets
description: An anthology series delving into the lives of guests and staff at luxury resorts. Season 3 received 23 Emmy nominations in 2025.

title: Edinburgh Shadows
description: A BBC crime drama reboot set in Edinburgh, following Detective Sergeant John Rebus as he navigates the city's criminal underworld. The series garnered critical acclaim and a 100% rating on Rotten Tomatoes.

title: Silent Paths
description: A British drama miniseries about a deaf man seeking to uncover the events leading to his imprisonment. The cast and crew primarily use British Sign Language.

title: Summer Hearts
description: A romantic teen drama set in 2018 Los Angeles, exploring the lives of two young athletes navigating love and family pressures. The series was renewed for a second season shortly after its release.

title: Crime Syndicate
description: A crime drama series that delves into the complexities of organized crime, featuring compelling performances and intricate storytelling.

title: Hidden Tracks
description: A semi-autobiographical drama by Richard Gadd, leading the 2025 TV Bafta nominations with eight nominations, including best limited drama and best leading actor.

title: Global Affairs
description: A political drama series following the complexities of international diplomacy and personal relationships. The second season returned to critical acclaim in 2025.

title: The Dozen Heroes
description: A South Korean fantasy action superhero series about twelve individuals who gain extraordinary powers and must navigate the challenges that come with them.

title: Shadow Line
description: A dark fantasy crime thriller series based on a Naver webtoon, exploring the secrets and mysteries surrounding a high school with supernatural elements.

title: Enchanted Manor
description: A romantic fantasy period drama set in the Joseon era, blending elements of romance, comedy, and fantasy as it follows the lives of its characters.

title: Zombie Heartlands
description: A South Korean romantic fantasy zombie comedy series where a couple attempts to reunite during a zombie outbreak overtaking South Korea.

title: The Tall Knight
description: A prequel to 'Game of Thrones' focusing on the adventures of Ser Duncan the Tall and his squire, Egg, set in the world of Westeros.

title: Legendary Voyage
description: The live-action adaptation of the popular anime continues as Monkey D. Luffy and his crew embark on new adventures in search of the legendary One Piece.

title: The Crimson Moon
description: A spin-off series set in the world of 'The Witcher,' exploring new characters and stories within the rich fantasy universe.

title: Wheel of Destiny
description: A continuation of the 'Wheel of Time' saga, delving deeper into the mysteries of the One Power and the battle against the Dark One.

title: Truth Detector: Season 2
description: Charlie Cale returns as a human lie detector, solving a new mystery each week with celebrity guest appearances.

title: Switched Fates
description: A mystery-thriller series where two women from vastly different backgrounds switch souls after a car accident, unearthing dangerous secrets.

title: Aftermath
description: An Australian drama exploring the fallout of an incident that sees a man slap a child at a suburban barbecue.

title: Holmes & Heiress
description: A modern take on the classic detective, featuring Sherlock Holmes' daughter solving complex mysteries.

title: Vanished Secrets
description: A gripping mystery series delving into the disappearance of a loved one and the secrets that unravel.

title: The Cipher Files
description: A suspenseful tale of espionage and betrayal, as a former agent is drawn back into a world of secrets.

title: Justice Unveiled
description: The iconic series returns with new cases and fresh perspectives on justice and law enforcement.

title: Inspector Maigret: Chronicles
description: The legendary French detective returns in this classic mystery series, solving crimes with his unique approach.

title: Island of Firsts
description: A documentary-style reality show following twelve adult virgins as they explore intimacy, relationships, and personal growth while living together in an island retreat.

title: Solo Seekers
description: A Tamil-language reality show featuring a group of single men from diverse professional backgrounds attempting to find the perfect partner for them.

title: Kid vs. Star
description: A Tamil-language reality show where kids take on celebrities in a fun battle of wits, aiming to entertain and engage the audience.

title: Villain Royale
description: A reality competition series bringing together 11 notorious figures from popular reality shows to compete for a $200,000 prize and the title of 'America's Ultimate Supervillain'.

title: Celebrity Prank Wars
description: Celebrities secretly disrupt fake game show scenarios to add money to a hidden prize pot for unsuspecting contestants, blending reality and comedy.

title: Potomac Lives
description: A reality series following the lives of affluent women in Potomac, Maryland, showcasing their personal and professional experiences.

title: Street Race Kings
description: Street racers compete at tracks across the country for a $200,000 prize, showcasing high-speed thrills and intense competition.

title: Extreme Encounters
description: A series exploring extreme human behavior, wild weather, insane accidents, and acts of kindness, offering a raw look at real-life events.
